content: **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** make a quick and practical dishcloth with the cottage dishcloth crochet pattern this simple design works up fast using just 106 yards of lily sugar n cream yarn it uses chains half_double_crochet and double_crochet stitches making it an easy and functional project step-by-step photos and a video tutorial are included to guide you along the way yarn lily sugar n cream medium/worsted weight crochet hook size 5 0 mm h skills needed chain half_double_crochet double_crochet get the free pattern today and start crocheting your own handmade dishcloths join the cal newsletter here https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/47a92529ba this is just one of the patterns included in our dishcloth of the month club collection > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until march 10 2025 > at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on march 10th and it will > show as $0 00 **the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on march 9th at 9 00 pm est new york time 20 00 ** **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
